remarks: Value of the adjoint function for ` T ` in the domain of ` adjh ` . (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
adjval $p |- ( T e. dom adjh -> ( adjh ` T ) = ( iota_ u e. ( ~H ^m ~H ) A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( x .ih ( T ` y ) ) = ( ( u ` x ) .ih y ) ) ) $.
$d T u x y $.
